name: The Pirate Bay - Deep Dark
description: A dark version of The Pirate Bay for all those who live in darkness.
additional_info:
Instructions: Just install it. Also, it is recommended to install AdBlock alongside Stylish as there are some iframes that are impossible (for me) to remove by just CSS.

Google Chrome only (for now).

Changelog:

0.3b:
Fixes.

0.2b:
Various small fixes. Torrent details page completed.

0.1b:
Initial release.

discussions.name: small modification - makes it eaven better
